definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.english: The faults diagnosis of the gearbox were analyzed by wavelet analysis method.
sentences.chinese: 文中主要用小波分析對齒輪箱進行了故障診斷。

sentences.english: Lightnin reducer allows you to change the seal without removing gear driver.
sentences.chinese: 維修和更換密封不需要移動萊寧的齒輪箱傳動系統。

sentences.english: Remove transfer case from under vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 從車輛下拆卸動力分導齒輪箱。

sentences.english: For frames of machines, gearboxes, valves and pump bodies, machine housings.
sentences.chinese: 對於機，齒輪箱，閥門和泵體，機座的框架。

sentences.english: In the paper, the wavelet neural network is applied in fault diagnosis of the gear-box.
sentences.chinese: 本文將小波神經網絡應用到齒輪箱故障診斷當中。

sentences.english: Fuel oil purifier overhauled and cleaned, gear case oil renewed.
sentences.chinese: 燃油分油機解體清潔，齒輪箱換油。

sentences.english: When the gears are engaged, the crankshaft keeps the car moving.
sentences.chinese: 而曲軸，在齒輪箱掛擋時，又使汽車持續運動。

sentences.english: Lubricating transmit device under the lubricator, separated with gear box.
sentences.chinese: 伸線部分採用全浸式潤滑，與齒輪箱部分隔離處理。

sentences.english: After gear box is reinstalled, just tighten up the screws and washers with even force.
sentences.chinese: 重新安裝齒輪箱將跟螺絲及華司用力平均鎖緊即可。

sentences.english: The different loading sets for four-square power cycling gear-box test stand are described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了功率封閉齒輪箱試驗檯的各種加載機構。

sentences.english: Transfer case noisy in all drive modes.
sentences.chinese: 動力分導齒輪箱在所有驅動模式中發出噪音。

sentences.english: The wings are driven by a crankshaft that is connected to a gearbox.
sentences.chinese: 機翼由連接着齒輪箱的機軸驅動。

sentences.english: The encloser trailing bar assembly is arranged behind the gear case assembly.
sentences.chinese: 在齒輪箱總成的後面，設置有罩殼拖板總成。
